 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּלַח‎</span>] **verb** ==cleave== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***cleave***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎פְּלַח‎</span> (usually),<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, are ***till, work, serve*** [=<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָבַד‎</span>]); — 

**Qal** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֹּלֵחַ‎</span> [[Ps.141.7|Ps 141:7]] of ***cleaving***, ploughing, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּאָרֶץ‎</span> (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בקע‎</span>). **Pi\`el** ***Imperfect*** 

**1.** ***cleave open, through***, 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְפַלַּח‎</span> of piercing kidneys [[Job.16.13|Job 16:13]], liver [[Prov.7.23|Prov 7:23]] (both figurative); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְּפַלַּח אֶל‎</span> [[2Kgs.4.39|2Kgs 4:39]] of cutting up (fruit) into pot. 

**2.** ***cause to cleave open***, 3 feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַלְדֵיהֶן תְּפַלַּחְנָה‎</span> [[Job.39.3|Job 39:3]] of animals bringing forth young; read perhaps <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּפַלַּטְנָה‎</span> ([[Job.21.10|Job 21:10]]).
